archimate:Node.name: [Base Site FS] Base Backup File System (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: Holds backups. Recall that for many file systems GPFS SNAPS constiture backups. However, there are other backup cases, for example a place to keep database logs external to a database environment. This file system provide capability for backups-other-than-by snapshots. This proves for capacity at the Base for the construction project and deliverty to the operations project, exluding capacity needed for the Chilean DAC.
